tokens.resolved_gloss: used very widely as demonstrative, lo!; interrogative, whether?; or conditional, if, although; also Oh that!, when; hence, as a negative, not

tokens.resolved_gloss: to open, i.e. be (causatively, make) roomy; usually figuratively (in a mental or moral sense) to be (causatively, make) simple or (in a sinister way) delude

tokens.resolved_gloss: the heart; also used (figuratively) very widely for the feelings, the will and even the intellect; likewise for the centre of anything
